entry.tran: 毛里求斯的;毛里求斯人的;毛里求斯文化的
entry.def: Mauritian means belonging or relating  to Mauritius, or to its people or culture.

entry.tran: 毛里求斯人;毛里求斯公民
entry.def: A Mauritian is a Mauritian citizen, or a person of Mauritian origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Mauritius
1. of or related to the island or country of Mauritius or its inhabitants;
